title: Unable to retrieve eth1 deposit transaction data with: accounts-v2 list --show-deposit-data
body:
# üêû Bug Report Unable to retrieve eth1 deposit transaction data with: `accounts-v2 list --show-deposit-data` ### Description `accounts-v2 list` works fine, but with the flag `--show-deposit-data` it gives an error: **deposit_data.ssz: no files found** (detailed error code below) ### Has this worked before in a previous version? Previous version Prysm alpha16 didn't work with Medalla testnet. ## üî¨ Minimal Reproduction - Deposit 32eth with metamask via Eth2 Launch Pad - Update node with prysm alpha17 - Import json keystore file - Run beacon-chain - Run Validator - Run accounts-v2 list --show-deposit-data ## üî• Error 

ethereum@ethnode-c4abc6966:~$ validator accounts-v2 list --show-deposit-data
[2020-07-31 14:00:42]  INFO accounts-v2: (wallet path) /home/ethereum/.eth2validators/prysm-wallet-v2
[2020-07-31 14:00:42]  INFO accounts-v2: (wallet directory) /home/ethereum/.eth2validators/prysm-wallet-v2
[2020-07-31 14:00:42]  INFO accounts-v2: (account passwords path) /home/ethereum/.eth2validators/prysm-wallet-v2-passwords
[2020-07-31 14:00:42]  INFO accounts-v2: Successfully opened wallet
[2020-07-31 14:00:42]  INFO direct-keymanager-v2: Decrypting validator accounts...

Showing 1 validator account
View the eth1 deposit transaction data for your accounts by running `validator accounts-v2 list --show-deposit-data

 100% [===============================================================]  [2s:0s]Account 0 | three-words-censored | Created 1 day ago
[validating public key] 0x907f913aab0d5793441cdd24643831af6452ba8e8fdd95da925a9c0c5154c973d7a2ee5b176ba57d47871fac8723f8b7
[2020-07-31 14:00:44] FATAL accounts-v2: Could not list accounts: could not list validator accounts with direct keymanager: could not read file for account: deposit_data.ssz: no files found /home/ethereum/.eth2validators/prysm-wallet-v2/direct/three-words-censored/deposit_data.ssz
## üåç Your Environment Linux ARM64 on Raspberry Pi4 8GB + 1TB SSD (USB3) details to be found [here](https://www.reddit.com/r/ethereum/comments/gf3nhg/ethereum_on_arm_raspberry_pi_4_images_release/) **What version of Prysm are you running? (Which release)** `version Prysm/v1.0.0-alpha.17/f414cf36b99dea2d997d0141acb3d1a319fb5578. Built at: 2020-07-31 03:04:02+00:00` **Anything else relevant (validator index / public key)?** Validator node on beaconcha.in: [here](https://beaconcha.in/validator/907f913aab0d5793441cdd24643831af6452ba8e8fdd95da925a9c0c5154c973d7a2ee5b176ba57d47871fac8723f8b7) Launch Pad TX on Etherscan: [here](https://goerli.etherscan.io/tx/0xa87d619e985680bcf8053bf20a94b6100dae7021439deabb4d4f960dc911a6a1) Ran Onyx testnet fine with alpha15 and alpha16.
